page.title: 08SHOTESHAM/HOWE HEALTH
page.content: Villagers tend to visit{SUGERIES}at Saxlingham, 2 miles, and Poringland, 5 miles. 2 Practice nurses visit homes as necessary. A bus service coincides with morning sugery at Saxlingham allowing for 20 minutes to see the doctor, bus passengers having priority A GP makes a regular weekly visit to the Trinity Hall to coincide with the Over 60s club meeting.This is a non_appointment service though he will bring prescriptions on request. Midwives are shared with adjoining areas.{HOME CONFINEMENTS}are encouraged by local GPs. A Chiropodist visits once a month. A Marie Curie nurse is available to assist in terminal care. Doctors dispense{PRESCRIPTIONS} at the surgery. The nearest Chemist is at 6 miles.
